channel.title: macaroni on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in macaroni on Recipes

item.title: macaroni and Vienna sausages
item.description: Ingredients 1-2 pound macaroni 1-2 pounds of grated American cheese 2 cups white sauce 2 cans of Vienna sausages Directions Cook the macaroni in plenty of salt water, until soft. Remove from heat, drain them and pour warm water again. Drain again. Make a white sauce with the recipe we offer you lower, and add the grated cheese. Cut into wheels several sausages, leaving 6 whole for adornment. Combine the macaroni, sauce, and sausage slices.

item.title: macaroni with sobreasada
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound of macaroni 8 cups of water 2 tablespoons salt 1-4 pound of broken ham 1-2 cup oil 2 split onions 1 clove of crushed garlic 1-4 pound of oversized des menuzada 1 can of tomato paste 1 cup water Directions Boil the macaroni in salted water and drain them after cooking. Fry the ham in the oil and add the other ingredients Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the macaroni and stir.
